title: Bobby Comments On Morgan Wallen’s IG Apology + Jared Isaacman Details Civilian Space Mission + Bobby’s Mailbag: Son Stood Up To Bully
itunes:title: Bobby Comments On Morgan Wallen’s IG Apology + Jared Isaacman Details Civilian Space Mission + Bobby’s Mailbag: Son Stood Up To Bully
description:
Bobby shares his thoughts on the Morgan Wallen IG apology video posted last night. Amy also shares her thoughts as the mother of two black children. We talk with billionaire Jared Isaacman who is pioneering the first civilian space mission. Plus, Bobby opens up the mailbag to share a message from a listener who needs advice on a situation with her son and a school bully.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
